name: Replace string for each item in list
description: Loops through the list and replaces each occurrence of ${i} with an item in the list.

properties.helptext: A find-and-replace will be performed on the `template` text for each of these items.
The character that separates (delimits) each item in the list.

Very important: the character #{i} will be searched for and replaced with each item in the list.
E.g. If the first item in the list is the number 7 then the template text `It has been ${i} days since...` will become `It has been 7 days since...`

On completing all the replaced templates will be combined into one text result. Each template will be separated by this specified concatenating character. If you leave the concatenating character empty then the result will be a list (array) of templates instead of a single text result.
